text: Blaesospira is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Blaesospira include: *Blaesospira echinus (Wright in Pfeiffer, 1864) \- type species *Blaesospira hortensiae Jaume, 1984 == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Blaesospira
